Package it.develhope.StudioMedico.controllers

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
it.develhope.StudioMedico.controllers.PatientController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/patient") public class PatientController extends Object
This class permit to use the Api implemented in the PatientServiceImpl
